name: Security Issue
about: Report a security issue in voiage
title: '[Security]: '
labels: security
assignees: ''

---

⚠️ **IMPORTANT: DO NOT SUBMIT SECURITY VULNERABILITIES HERE** ⚠️

This is a public issue tracker. Do not report security vulnerabilities here as they will be publicly visible.

To report a security vulnerability responsibly:

1. **Email**: Send details to [security@voiage.org](mailto:security@voiage.org)
2. **GitHub Security Advisory**: Use GitHub's private security advisory feature

For more information, see our [Security Policy](https://github.com/doughnut/voiage/blob/main/SECURITY.md).
